title: 068 - The Song Of The Summer Has Arrived
description: On today's show, the guys embrace Feel Good Friday as they discuss their favorite kinds of cheeses, what the best types of crackers are, and dive right into the Pod FOD. They also bring in Gumpy live from Canada to discuss whether or not Edmonton and Toronto stink, they talk about Pat and Tony's upcoming weddings, and are blessed with the song of the summer and potentially the century from Year of the Buffalo. Don't forget to send your questions in to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram to be featured on the show. We'll see you guys in a week or so. Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
